description: Ariabart Tytania is one of the four dukes in line to succeed Ajman Tytania as the head of the Tytania Clan. Early on, Ariabart underestimates the Eurian Fleet at the battle of Cereberus and is forced to retreat by Fan Hyulick. His retreat earns him the ignominious honor of being the first Tytania to suffer defeat in battle in 200 years. It is shown that of the four dukes, Ariabart mainly prefers the company of Jouslain and has great respect for his abilities. Ariabart flagship name is call the Golden Sheep.
name: Aryabhata Tytania
